data.name: 91 Days: Losing to Win, and What Comes After
data.short_description: After the incident with Vanno and Serpente, a war between the Vanetti and Orco families is all but guaranteed. Nero goes on the run with Avilio, where the two learn a great deal about each other's personality and past. But a huge man and his hunting dog are pursuing them...
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
